• Story Quests •

• Story Quests •
This is the most important mode for progressing through the game. Playing Story Quests will unlock various other game modes.
• Chapters, Scenes, & Battles •
Tap the designated location and select a Story Quest.
• First-Time Clear Rewards •
You can acquire <color=#00ffff>Visiore</color> whenever you <color=#00ffff>clear a quest for the first time</color>.
• Companions •
You can pay <color=#00ffff>gil</color> to invite <color=#00ffff>another player's</color> <color=#00ffff>unit</color> to <color=#00ffff>accompany</color> you on your quest.
• Companions II •
Normally, you must pay gil to acquire a companion, but this time only you may do so <color=#00ffff>for free</color>.
• Ranking Up •

When you go up in rank, your <color=#00ffff>NRG will be fully restored</color>, and your maximum <color=#00ffff>NRG</color> and <color=#00ffff>number of friends</color> will <color=#00ffff>increase</color>.
• Beginner's Campaign •
For a fixed period after first starting the game, playing Story Quests can result in special benefits.
